ingredients.name: Tanqueray gin
ingredients.notes: Tanqueray gin provides a crisp and dry juniper flavor base.

ingredients.name: fresh lemon
ingredients.notes: Fresh lemon adds a bright and citrusy zing.

ingredients.name: sugar
ingredients.notes: Sugar adds sweetness that balances the tartness of lemon.

ingredients.name: orange flower water
ingredients.notes: Orange flower water gives a subtle floral note.

ingredients.name: Rose bitters
ingredients.notes: Rose bitters contribute a delicate spicy and floral aroma.

ingredients.name: cream
ingredients.notes: Cream lends a rich and velvety texture.

ingredients.name: egg white
ingredients.notes: Egg white creates a frothy and smooth mouthfeel.

tasting_notes.description: The RAMOS GIN FIZZ offers a unique balance between the crispness of gin and the freshness of citrus.
Subtle sweet and floral notes from the sugar, orange flower water, and rose bitters provide complexity.
The creamy and frothy texture makes it taste indulgent yet refreshing.
Ideal for those who appreciate a classic cocktail with a rich mouthfeel and a complex bouquet of flavors and aromas.

ingredients.name: El Jimador reposado tequila
ingredients.notes: El Jimador reposado tequila gives a smooth oak and vanilla note with a hint of cooked agave.

ingredients.name: triple sec
ingredients.notes: Triple sec adds a sweet, orange citrus flavor that brightens the cocktail.

ingredients.name: fresh lime juice
ingredients.notes: Fresh lime juice brings a tart and refreshing acidity, balancing the sweetness of the triple sec.

tasting_notes.description: The Margarita has a harmonious blend of sweet, sour, and tequila's smooth warmth.
Expect a refreshing citrus aroma with undertones of oak and vanilla.
On the palate, the tartness of lime complements the sweetness of triple sec, while the reposado tequila provides a mellow complexity.
The finish is crisp with a lingering citrusy aftertaste.
